meanings.definition: A person with a muscular and athletic physique.
meanings.sent1: The gym is full of mesomorphs who love to lift weights.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often have mesomorphs body types due to their active lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: At the bodybuilding competition, the mesomorphs flexed their muscles proudly.
meanings.sent4: His physique was like that of a mesomorphs, strong and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The mesomorphs stood out in the crowd with their toned muscles.

meanings.definition: The body type characterized by a well-developed musculature.
meanings.sent1: She admired the mesomorphs at the gym for their defined muscles.
meanings.sent2: Bodybuilders often strive to achieve the mesomorphs body type through intense training.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends joked that they were all secretly mesomorphs in disguise.
meanings.sent4: His physique resembled that of a mesomorphs, solid and robust.
meanings.sent5: The mesomorphs in the fitness magazine inspired her to start weightlifting.
